markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Elk](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=301)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 85</row>

Powerful and swift land mammals, elk range through the plains, hills, and forests of the wilderness.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Elk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1775) (Creature 1), [Elk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2201) (Creature 1), [Megaloceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1776) (Creature 4), [Megaloceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2202) (Creature 4)
name: Elk
